Properties.Name: Author
Properties.Comment: Author - User, who added the file

Properties.Name: CreationDate
Properties.Comment: Date of adding file to the database

Properties.Name: PictureIndex
Properties.Comment: Index of an icon, corresponding to the file extension, to be displayed in the list

Properties.Name: FileName
Properties.Comment: Full description (of length of up to 256 chars)

Properties.Name: TextStorage
Properties.Comment: Text, extracted from file - for full-text search

Properties.Name: CurrentVersionAuthor
Properties.Comment: Author - User, who created the version

Properties.Name: CurrentVersionFilePath
Properties.Comment: Additional path to a file on drive (in case if FileStorageType - "on drive")

Properties.Name: StoreVersions
Properties.Comment: Store versions - if False, file always has single Active version

Properties.Name: FileByFolders
Properties.Comment: Opens a list form of files in folders
